page.title: 16Tanterton Area
page.content: This area has become residential since county council allowed it to be developed by private builders and the Central Lancashire Development Corporation who have been filling it with {housing} estates.Many of the people interviewed liked the area,but the younger people felt that a more active night life was needed. In the area there is a new {primary school} called {Poole House} built to provide places for the large number of children that have moved into the area with their parents.250 children attend the school every day.Two years ago only 120 went there.{Shops} in the centre of the so called village help pensioners and parents with toddlers going into town to do their basic shopping.The local pub built specially in the area is called the Falkland's Heroes.
